original_title: Curious George: Goes to a Birthday Party
overview: Birthdays mean cakes, presents and parties, but most of all they mean friends! Join your best monkey pal, Curious George, for 8 episodes of his Daytime Emmy®-winning PBS KIDS® TV series as he takes a crack at a piñata, plans a surprise party and bakes a birthday treat. It’s time to celebrate when Curious George Goes to a Birthday Party!
tagline: It’s time to celebrate when Curious George Goes to a Birthday Party!
title: Curious George: Goes to a Birthday Party
